const Err = async () => {
	throw new Error(42);
};

const Obj = {
	async A (){
		try {
			return Err();
		} catch {
			console.log('A');
		}
	},
	async B (){
		try {
			await Err();
		} catch {
			console.log('B');
		}
	},
	async C (){
		try {
			Err();
		} catch {
			console.log('C');
		}
	},
};

( async () => {
	for( const key in Obj )
	{
		try {
			await Obj[key]();
		} catch {
			console.log('D');
		}
	}
} )();
